info.title: Setu Billpay - White label solution
info.description: Enable easy BBPS bill payments in your App

billParameters.description: The bill params for fetching the bill

name.description: The display name of the parameter. This has to match what is sent in fields.

value.description: The value of the customer parameter

selectedPaymentOptions.description: Payment details of the selected payment option from bill fetch response

timestamp.description: Timestamp provided by partner while making payment request.

bills.description: Multiple bills in case of response from B2B biller

do-ift-status-check.description: When debug is enabled, do-ift-status-check will do status check of internal fund transfer.

dummyMsgId.description: On debug, this is msgId NEGATIVE 10

headTimestamp.description: On debug, this value is used as head timestamp NEGATIVE 5

invalidCustomerTagValue.description: On debug, pass invalid customer tag value NEGATIVE 15

skipFetch.description: On debug, skip fetch request before payment, NEGATIVE - 27,

bills.description: Array of bills to be paid when making payments for LIST billers. Optional for SINGLE billers.

dummyTransactionRefId.description: When debug is enabled, this dummy-transaction-id is used as the transaction id. This allows us to test arbitrary length refId test cases.

transactionProvider.description: On debug, this is the transaction provider NEGATIVE 14

dummyBillerId.description: On debug, this is the billerId NEGATIVE 13

dummy-npci-pool-branch-id.description: When debug is enabled, replaces npci pool branch id

dummyAgentId.description: On debug, this is the agent id NEGATIVE 12

invalidPaymentInformation.description: On debug, this value is sent in payment information NEGATIVE - 4

skipPaymentResponseAck.description: When debug is enabled, skip the final acknowledgement. This allows us to test "Elimination of Reversal". The details on which case to skip ack is sent via "eliminationOfReversalDetails"

dummy-npci-pool-bank-id.description: When debug is enabled, replaces npci pool bank id

fail-fund-transfer-count.description: When debug is enabled, this fails fund transfer for count times

invalidCustomerTagKey.description: On debug, invalid customer params will be sent NEGATIVE 7

timeout-npci-request.description: When debug is enabled, this timeouts the npci request

timeout-npci-request-delay.description: When debug is enabled, this timesout the NPCI request. This actually hits the NPCI request in a delayed approach. The delay time in seconds.

debug.description: When a non-direct payment is being made, refId of fetch/validate is used to populate customer and biller data. When `debug` field is set to `true`, passed customer, biller or agent details will be replace the fetch/validate data. This allows us to run test cases that require diff details from initial fetch/validate request.

dummyAmount.description: On debug, this is the final amount NEGATIVE 11, 22

skip-npci-heartbeat.description: When debug is enabled, skips the npci heartbeat check before issuing payment request

skip-npci-response.description: When debug is enabled, skip-npci-response won't process NPCI response.

skipBillerResponse.description: On debug, don't send biller response on fetch req NEGATIVE 21

headVersion.description: On debug, this head version is used. NEGATIVE - 1

ouid.description: On debug, this is payment ouid NEGATIVE 6

dummy-npci-pool-account-number.description: When debug is enabled, replaces npci pool account number

passBlankPaymentInformation.description: On debug, pass blank payment information NEGATIVE - 26

amount.description: Amount to be paid in paise for the specified bill number

name.description: The display name of the configuration

paymentChannel.description:
This is the initiating channel.
1. `AGT`: Offline agent.
2. `BNKBRNCH`: Bank branch.
3. `BSC`: Business correspondent
4. `MOB`: Mobile application
5. `INT`: Internet portal
6. `INTB`: Internet banking
7. `MOBB`: Mobile banking
8. `ATM`: ATM
9. `KIOSK`: KIOSK

name.description: The display name of the selected payment option from fetch response.

amount.description: The amount being paid for the selected payment option in paise.

categorySubType.description: Plan sub category as defined by the Biller.

effectiveFrom.description: Effective from date of corresponding Plan.

status.description: Effective to date of corresponding Plan.

additionalInfo.description: Plan Additional information details provided by the Biller.

amount.description: Plan amount in rupees as defined by the Biller.

categoryType.description: Plan category as defined by the Biller.

description.description: Plan description as defined by the Biller.

effectiveTo.description: Effective to date of corresponding Plan.

patch-due-date.description: On debug, use this as the bill fetch due date.

allowFetchForAdhocBillers.description: On debug, make fetch for payment only billers NEGATIVE 20

patch-bill-date.description: On debug, use this as the bill fetch bill date.

orgId.description: ID assigned to your organisation as provided by Setu.

mobileNumber.description: Mobile number of the user for which the link is generated. If no value is sent, there is a mobile number and OTP flow invoked to validate the user. All transactions and complaints are listed for a given mobile number.

redirectTo.description: Specific page user needs to be redirected to. If left blank, link opens to the homepage.

billerId.description: If redirected to a particular bill - pass this value.

categoryName.description: The category of the biller passed in the billerId field.

billParams.description: To be used if the Agent wishes to redirect the user to a specific bill page.

mobile.description: Mobile number with 6, 10 and 20 digits are valid.

mac.description: Mandatory if channel is `INT`, `INTB`. Not required for others.

terminalId.description: Mandatory if channel is `ATM`, `AGT`, `KIOSK` and `BSC` . Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

geocode.description: Mandatory if channel is `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

id.description: The ID of the agent initiating the BBPS transaction.

ifsc.description: Mandatory if channel is `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

imei.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

ip.description: Mandatory if channel is `INT`, `INTB`. Not required for others.

app.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

os.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

postalCode.description: Mandatory if channel is  `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

transactionId.description: Unique transaction ID created by the Agent for this payment collection. Defined by Agent - minimum 10 chars and maximum 36 chars

orderId.description: Unique transaction ID created by Setu when initiating the payment request.

paymentDateTime.description: Timestamp of the payment in UTC (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)
